column5: Went down this morning for a bit and only got about ten minutes in before a really good thunderstorm rolled in.  We had to take cover under the bridge while it stormed for almost an hour.Got some much needed rain but messed my morning fishing up as the river is chocolate and full of crap,lol.So,just a heads up that it is coming.Here are a few pics while we waited it out.      Might go down later and see if it is better.Need my fishing fix.
Cool, I hope it heads this way, we could use the rain and I love a good long thundestorm  Thanks for the heads up.  Joey
J, we have been getting pounded here for the last 3 hours.Started with thunder and lightning,now were getting bursts of heavy down pours and thunder. Lots of water coming down.
Our power was out for 2 hours. Just back on. All of Midland/Penetang area was out.....as Leah was out in search of a Timmies with the lights on..with no success ! LOL
Ya to bad about the rain,I was tinking of hitting the grand in brantford but it will be at least two days before i get out now.
I too got caught in the downpour while fishing for local pike with my pops.  I'd say we got a good 2" of rain so far.  My grass is already starting to green up.  Corn Nug

You took some cool pictures!  Yeah...rained heavily in my neck of the woods too...the tribs will be high and chocolate milk for sure tomorrow...should be prime fishing Monday though!  Thanks for the report.

We were fishing a small lake near Apsley yesterday, on the water at about 7:30 and got caught out in abit of a storm around 9:00 am. When we saw the first lightning strike, we high-tailed it back to the launch and waited it out in the truck. After an hour or so, the worst had passed and we headed back out. Nothing but scattered showers the rest of the day and it remained warm and calm.  Unfortunately, the bite was off all day. All we could manage was lots of rockbass, a few dink SM and one semi-decent LM.
Despite the rain I think your son enjoyed the river.He got his hair cut  Good Pics.MTP
lol,ya MTP he wanted his hair cut for school pics next week
